mapper.select: select gr.*, m.name, cm.name as challenger_name from game_record gr JOIN challenger c ON gr.game_code=#{game_code} AND c.state=1 AND gr.game_code = c.game_code JOIN member m ON gr.maker_code = m.member_code JOIN member cm ON c.challenger_member_code = cm.member_code AND gr.challenger_code = cm.member_code where gr.time_end is null

select gr.*, m.name, cm.name as challenger_name from game_record gr JOIN challenger c ON gr.game_code=#{game_code} AND c.state=1 AND gr.game_code = c.game_code JOIN member m ON gr.maker_code = m.member_code JOIN member cm ON c.challenger_member_code = cm.member_code AND gr.challenger_code = cm.member_code where gr.time_end is not null
mapper.update: update member set record = record + 1, win = win + 1, score = score + 10 where member_code = #{maker_code}
update member set record = record + 1, lose = lose + 1, score = score - 3 where member_code = #{challenger_code}
update member set record = record + 1, win = win + 1, score = score + 10 where member_code = #{challenger_code}
update member set record = record + 1, lose = lose + 1, score = score - 3 where member_code = #{maker_code}
update member set record = record + 1, draw = draw + 1 where member_code = #{maker_code} or member_code = #{challenger_code}
update game_record set winner_code = #{maker_code}, loser_code = #{challenger_code}, time_end = sysdate where game_record_code = #{game_record_code}
update game_record set winner_code = #{challenger_code}, loser_code = #{maker_code}, time_end = sysdate where game_record_code = #{game_record_code}
update game_record set draw = 1, time_end = sysdate where game_record_code = #{game_record_code}
